original_text: And out of the city he took an officer that was set over the men of war, and five men of them that were in the king's presence, which were found in the city, and the principal scribe of the host, which mustered the people of the land, and threescore men of the people of the land that were found in the city:
korean_text: 또 성 중에서 사람을 사로잡았으니 곧 군사를 거느린 내시 한 사람과 또 성 중에서 만난 바 왕의 시종 다섯 사람과 백성을 징집하는 장관의 서기관 한 사람과 성 중에서 만난 바 백성 육십 명이라

sentences.original_text: And out of the city he took an officer
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 성에서 한 장교를 데려갔으며

sentences.original_text: that was set over the men of war
and five men of them that were in the king's presence
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 왕의 앞에 있던 다섯 사람을 데려갔으며

sentences.original_text: which were found in the city
and the principal scribe of the host
which mustered the people of the land
and threescore men of the people of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이 땅 백성 중 60명의 사람들을

sentences.original_text: that were found in the city:
